seriesJson.title: What a piece of work is a man
seriesJson.description: Aldous Huxley presents a lecture series in which he asks, "how did our ancestors think of human nature and in what terms ought we to think about it?"

node.title: Human potentialities, part 2
node.description: This program presents the conclusion of a lecture by Aldous Huxley entitled "Human Potentialities."
